entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:32 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 10:56 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 3.2°C
Wind: SW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries and rain showers near midnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
